update intel_system
sys_name = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_url = #{sysUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_memo = #{sysMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select a.user_id, a.account, a.accountfrom, a.accountName, a.tel ,date_format(c_date,'%Y-%m-%d') c_date from intel_user a
join intel_user_system b on a.user_id =b.user_id and b.system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
